us.conxio.HL7.HL7Stream
Interface HL7MessageHandler

All Known Implementing Classes:
HL7FileReader, HL7FileWriter, HL7MessageService, HL7SocketStream, HL7StreamBase
public interface HL7MessageHandler

A interface for HL7Message dispatch handlers.

Method Summary
 int dispatch(HL7Message msg)
          The only required method is dispatch, which may utilize the argumnet HL7Message object in any way.
 

Method Detail

dispatch

int dispatch(HL7Message msg)
             throws HL7IOException
The only required method is dispatch, which may utilize the argumnet HL7Message object in any way.

Parameters:
msg - a reference to the argument HL7Message object.
Returns:
a count of 0 or more dispatch occurrences related to the context dispatch invocation.
Throws:
HL7IOException
